title: Floral Cascade Jhumka: A Symphony of Colors
features: This captivating Jhumka features a radiant floral design meticulously set with shimmering diamond simulants and vibrant, multi-colored semi-precious gemstones. A lustrous freshwater pearl sits at the heart of the flower. The piece descends into a delicate cascading tassel of meticulously strung pink beads, culminating in shimmering blue accents. The goldwork features detailed filigree accents reminiscent of traditional South Indian craftsmanship.
colors: and a vibrant mix of Red
occasions: or adding a touch of South Indian elegance to contemporary outfits. Suitable for events like Sangeet
or simply elevating your everyday style.
description: This stunning Jhumka represents a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern design sensibilities. The Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's luster, while the vibrant gemstone palette exudes exuberance. The intricate detailing and craftsmanship make this piece a true heirloom in the making. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, allowing you to shine all day or night.
